title: HOUR 3 - Jimmy G, College Football Playoff
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Jimmy G, College Football Playoff
description:
Brian Noe, Rich Ohrnberger, and Geoff Schwartz, in for Colin, react to Jimmy Garropolo expressing his surprise over still being with the 49ers. Professional Sports Bettor Bill Krackomberger joins the guys to highlight bets he is hot on for Week 1 of the NFL season. The diets of offensive linemen go crazy. Plus, who do you want to see in the College Football Playoff?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
